TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Tgleq, title = Tgleq, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tgleq} }

S.FORM: lalu qalang mu ga Tgleq (Teliq, 鐵立庫部落), imi nya ga htagan na qsya aring gwagiq muci ke niya. cyux maki te Toyen keng pyasan na gogan (cobeh qalang Tayax na sincik), kinwagyq nya ga 1000-1500 meta. kayal nya krryax ga 21-23 kinhyaq nya. Aring cyama ru pwah sanmin mlu basu lga thoyay tehok qalang myan la. qalang Tgleq ru qalang Barung ga tmuhi qbirux kwara myan, pinmuhi myan qbirux ga hupa ru sbing balay, szyon balay muwah mkan okyak kahun hogan, bagan ga yasa qu pyang balay lmwan bway na qbirux. pyang blaq balay ga mwah simu qalang Tgriq ga maras simu nanak torak ga blaq, gi yaqih ngon basu nya kya. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 93% kyan ku 92 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 7% kyan ku 7 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 90%, Amis 1%, Truku 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Tgleq hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Tgleq hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Tgleq hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Tgleq hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Tgleq hya' ga Saruc. tay 'llaw na Tgleq hya' ga Tqwiy. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

lalo qalang mo ga Tgleq (Teliq, 鐵立庫部落), imi nya ga htagan na qsya aring gwagiq moci ke niya. cyox maki te Toyen keng pyasan na gogan (cobeh qalang Tayax na sincik), kinwagyq nya ga 1000-1500 meta. kayal nya krryax ga 21-23 kinhyaq nya. Aring cyama ro pwah sanmin mlo baso lga thoyay tehok qalang myan la. qalang Tgleq ro qalang Barong ga tmohi qbirox kwara myan, pinmohi myan qbirox ga hopa ro sbing balay, szyon balay mowah mkan okyak kahon hogan, bagan ga yasa qo pyang balay lmwan bway na qbirox. pyang blaq balay ga mwah simo qalang Tgriq ga maras simo nanak torak ga blaq, gi yaqih ngon baso nya kya. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 93% kyan ko 92 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 7% kyan ko 7 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 90%, Amis 1%, Troko 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ro kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Tgleq hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Tgleq hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Tgleq hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Tgleq hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Tgleq hya' ga Saroc. tay 'llaw na Tgleq hya' ga Tqwiy. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
